definitions.title: n.f. wall
definitions.body: —1Ch 4:23 + Ps 62:4 (MT [[גׇּדֵר]] q. v.), [[גְּדֶרֶת]] Ez Eze 13:5 (Co, cf. LXX; MT [[גׇּדֵר]]) Eze 42:12 (del. Co); pl. [[גְּדֵרוֹת]] Na 3:17 + 2 t., [[גְּדֵרׂת]] Nu 32:24; cstr. [[גִּדְרוֹת]] Nu 32:26 + 2 t., [[גִּדְרׂת]] Nu 32:16; sf. [[גְּדֵרׂתָיו]] Ps 89:41; —wall, hedge 1Ch 4:23 (or is this n.pr.loc.? cf. Öt) Na 3:17 (where grasshoppers alight), Je 49:3; wall, connected with Ezekiel's temple Ez Eze 42:12 (del. Co); defences Ps 89:41; elsewhere [[חאן]] ´[[ג]] sheep-folds Nu 32:16, Nu 32:36, 1Sa 24:4, Zep 2:6 cf. Nu 32:24; Ez Eze 13:5 Co [[גְּדֶרֶת]] after LXX; Ps 62:4 MT [[גדר הדחויה]], rd. ´[[גדרה ד]] cf. [[גׇּדֵר]].
